## Documentation of data

Interpret columns of the cleaned data:

```{r}
colnames(dat_clean)
```

-   "geo_accession": GEO sample ID, links each row to its expression data
-   "age"
-   "race"
-   "er_status": Estrogen receptor (ER) status of the tumor.
    -   P = positive
    -   N = negative
-   "pcr_vs_rd": Pathologic Complete Response (pCR) vs. Residual Disease (RD)\
    The main outcome variable in the MAQC-II project, meaning if there is 'no detectable tumor after treatment' or the 'tumor remains after therapy'
-   "pr_status": Progesterone receptor (PR) status of the tumor.
    -   P = positive
    -   N = negative
-   "tbefore": Tumor size before treatment.
    -   0-4 = size coded by numbers
-   "nbefore": Nodal involvement before treatment, represents whether lymph nodes had detectable cancer.
    -   0-3 = increasing levels of nodal disease
-   "bmngrd": Bloomâ€“Richardson (BR) grade\
    Scores reflect tumor aggressiveness.
    -   1 = low
    -   2 = intermediate
    -   3 = high
-   "er": Another coding of estrogen receptor status.
    -   0-100: increasing ER expression
-   "her2 status": Overall HER2 receptor classification (growth factor receptor)
    -   P = positive
    -   N = negative
-   "her2 ihc": HER2 status measured by IHC (Immunohistochemistry) assay.
    -   0-1 = negative
    -   2 = equivocal
    -   3 = positive
-   "her2 fish": HER2 status measured by FISH (Fluorescence In Situ Hybridization).
-   "histology": Tumor subtype based on microscopic examination.
-   "treatment code": The therapy the patient received.
